## About Me

Dr. Noha Orabi is a board-certified orthodontist having treated thousands of patients in private practice and the greater Cleveland community for the past 7 years.  She is an Assistant Clinical Professor and co-Director of the Early Treatment Clinic at Case Western Reserve University.
